title: Banned for no legitimate reason
body:
This Community and lack of Riot support against being bullied.
 Today i was playing on one of my other accounts for the dailies. Had a bad game and next think I know i get a message that my account was suspended,
 I put in a ticket to go went to chat, this is the conversation
Me
I want to know why there was no reason given, 
	
Chat started
	
Player Support Bot
Hey! We’re getting a ton of new chats right now. It may take upwards of 30 minutes to get to your chat, but if you sit tight we’ll help you out as soon as we can. If you’re not about that waiting in line lifestyle, you can always submit a ticket instead!
Orphi joined the chat
Orphi
Hello there!
I'll go have a look to see why your account was suspended.
Me
hi
ok
	
Orphi
Sorry for the wait, I got up your account and it looks like it was suspended for the use of scripting software or cheating software. :S
Me
i dont have anything like that
Orphi
I'm going to run my own investigation though to make sure it was properly placed- the last thing we wanna do is ban someone's account by mistake.
Me
ok
so what do u need me to do?
Orphi
I'll just need you to wait a minute or two basically! I will get back with you ASAP after my investigation of the account.
Me
ok
Orphi
Thanks for your patience, it took a bit longer than I expected, but I am done now
Me
ok
ty for getting back with me
Orphi
No problem!
So I looked over the account and it does look like scripts were heavily used in games. I am not allowed to say when they were used or what they did, due to the sensitive nature of that info, it can be used against us
I understand you said it wasnt your doing, but I am not seeing any suspicious log ins or unauthorized access on the account. :(
Me
ok first off ive never used any scripts
at all period
ive might have not played that well
but that doesnt me ive cheated
Orphi
I'm not trying to accuse you of anything, I am only reporting what I found.
Me
ok can you send me a copy
	
since it is my account
	
so that i can contest it
	
if it means that im still under ban
Orphi
Your account's suspension would be remaining I'm afraid. But how do you mean send you a copy exactly? I can't give yo uthe information relating to the scripting we found though as I stated earlier- that information is sensitive and can be used against us to make our future investigations for scripting harder.
Me
ur full of shit
	
all because some assholes
	
got pissed and reported me because they where mad they lost
	
on a blind pick i called my lance
	
i called sup
	
no one took a jungler
	
so how is it my fault
	
and my adc just stood there like a moron the whole game
	
but if ur going to suspend me for cheating then maybe i should start doing so
	
so
	
i want to know exaclty why u think im scriping
	
	
Orphi
Well this isn't based on a report, it's a suspension we issue after an extensive investigation for software that interacts with the game files in the client that gives an unfair advantage.
Me
so that automitically make me guilty
	
bs
	
i have no idea what softeware you are talking about
	
give me a list
	
bull shit
	
	
Orphi
I wouldn't be able to provide such a list because if I did then you would be able to give that information to those who make the software and tell them what happened. I'm not saying that's what you WOULD do, but its the risk of it which is why I cannot
Me
whyh
	
i have no software
	
othere then you pos client that sure acts like a virus
	
that why i think a plane need to dive staight in your office
	
i think you coulndt find anythging so ur making it up
	
thats why it tool longer
	
so ur just giving an exsuce because there isnt anything but ur client
	
	
Orphi
I'm not making it up, really
Me
i want a manager
	
	
Orphi
it's a bad business practice to lie to players and much less ban an account for no reason.
Me
because
	
	
Orphi
There are no higher escalations of Player Support specialist I can escalate you to, sorry.
Me
i want a manager why would i spend money on this game when you can make up whatever reason to ban me
	
well that is the case someone made a mistake i have no scripts running on this game or any game i play
	
so i am being banned for something i didnt do
	
so how is that fair
	
	
Orphi
I understand it feels like this is very one sided, I don't blame you, but I can confirm this isn't us making anything up here. I have investigated the account and found 3rd party tools were being used on the account, and whether it was you or not as the account owner you are responsible for all activity on the account. I won't be removing the suspension because of the association with scripts on it. There's no manager I can send you to and any other agent will tell you the same thing.
Me
what lol sumo?
	
its on my phone
	
it doenst run on my pc as a matter of fact its not on and they paid for access to api which u guys sell to access ur website
	
it doenst play the game for me
	
	
Orphi
No it wouldn't be lolsumo
	
since lolsumo doesn't interact with the client as you said
Me
thats the only tool i have
	
so im fucked
	
	
Orphi
I see. I sadly can't undo the suspension no.
Me
really
	
i an sooo pissed rigjh no and u have given me a fucking shred of everidenct so i will make bots for this game
	
so u can just go ahead and perma ban this accoiunt if you want but i will make 1000s of them
	
so
	
you want to accuse me then fine i guess no i qwill be guiltly of it
	
fuck oifff
	
	
Orphi
It is your time to use for what you wish.
	
Unless you have any other questions I'll be closing this chat out.
Me
i wasnt my account back cna i have it back
	
i want my account back can i have it back last chance
	
unless u can show me logs proving i was scripting
	
other then a bunche of asshole nbeoing pussys
	
	
Orphi
Sorry, as I said before I cannot provide specific evidence of the scripting on the account. That information can be used against us to make scripts harder to detect in thefuture. We want to make sure the game is fair and has no cheating.
Me
because u have none there is none to find yu are full of fucking shit i wasnt my ticket esscalated
	
ur fucking full fo shit
	
do u need vnc what
	
u can look at my machine
	
	
Orphi
As you have no other concerns I will be closing this chat out. Good bye.
Me
yeah have a big concern this is fucking bullshoit i have done nothing wrong
	
and i being wrongfully accused
	
so yes i have a big concerin this is a bullshit reason im going to get on forums and start posting everythinbgw we descussed and im putting it on facebook to make people aware of this crap

replies.body: I'm glad you got banned, look how rude you were to the support person, he tried to help & stuff.

see its people like you guys that are the cause of this bs, yes i was rude but he outright lied about me having scripted and thats why i was angry. If you where accused of stealing how and then was told they had evidience, basically planted evidence on you and said you where guilty of it, how would you react

and my response was right after he said nothing can be done. I hardly call that help when you make up something to let the vote stand he was just being lazy and Im not the only one riot has done this to. Also all i have to do is get a bunch of people to vote you as scripting and you account is banned , so basically everyone is guilty until proven innocent. You know what I'm glad they banned me to from assholes like you all. I hope that the Creator is right about the an apocalypse you get what you guys deserve. Lying , cheating , stealing and bearing false witness is ok in your book i guess . Karma has a way of coming back full circle 3 fold.
 Enjoy your life while you can, but if you get it back at ya ill be there to rub it in your face.

Now see, if you had actually kept your cool maybe you would have had enough sense to ask "Then why is my other account fine? It is played from the same machine." 

But nah, you decided to have a fit.

>It's a bad business practice to lie to players and much less ban an account for no reason.

Ultimately, I'm afraid this is right. It may be that there are things on your computer you don't know about that register as scripts to Riot's detection, but historically they *do* put a lot of energy into confirming their data is accurate on whether or not anything has been touching data it shouldn't be touching. If they say something was detected, then *something* was detected.
You deserve an Ip-Ban, cuz ur were a jerk to that customer support rep.

On another note, they cheating of this kind in waves. The don't do it immediately following the act of cheating, they gather enough evidence on many accounts, then ban them all at once. The actual act of cheating could have occurred months ago.

This company will go to the ends of the Earth to make sure the "Reporting System" is never wrong. The best part is I can tell it is a bullshit ban because of the fact that he had to search for cheats. But you got suspended after a game ended, which means the machine would've had to find them first. All he would've had to do was bring up your account, look at the system to find the reasoning and specific games you were reported for, and examine them, examining anything else is out of the bounds of the suspension and you really should send another ticket and hope to get a different person, or keep ticketing the same guy until somebody tells you the truth, that the system was wrong.
